review: Thus didn't work out so well. Hate that it doesn't have a remote, not even controls thru the chromcast. No way to go back a page or forward. You can only play and pause. Also, works somewhat ok with you tube but buffers. And hardly ever worked with netflix. Would always display some error code.  I called I emailed I looked at blogs online,  & still nothing helped.  Tried on another tv with a diff internet provider at a different house. Still didn't work. I don't recommend this at all. Try a smart blu ray dvd player with screen mirroring instead.

review: Chromecast is a great device for broadcasting content from your computer directly to your TV screen.  It was a breeze to set up and easy to connect.  I did have some connection issues because my router wasn't powerful enough to send a clear signal, but I recently upgraded the router and now have no issues at all.  I do wish that the device would operate on the higher frequency 5ghz, not just the 2.5ghz band.
